actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to Representative Joseph E. Brennan from the State of Maine.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker of the House or his designee to administer the oath of office to the Honorable Joseph E. Brennan at Portland, Maine, on or after January 9, 1987.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to administer the oath of office to Representative Joseph E. Brennan from the State of Maine.
